name: PharmaceuticalTreatmentIdentifier
description: Searches on the value provided in the pharmaceutical treatment identifier extension ('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-PharmaceuticalTreatment.Identifier') in the following resources:      * [MedicationRequest](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/medicationrequest.html)     * [MedicationDispense](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/medicationdispense.html)     * [MedicationStatement](http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/medicationstatement.html)     * [MedicationAdministration](http://hl7.org/r4/medicationadministration.html)
purpose: To select the MedicationRequest, MedicationDispense, MedicationAdministration, and MedicationStatement resources based on a specific pharmaceutical treatment identifier.
